short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatic card image tooltips for MTG video streams.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Magic CardSpotter shows card image tooltips for <video> streams. The tooltip shows a large readable card image with a scryfall link. (multiple videos supported)

Latest update: Strixhaven (STX)

Please report any issues to https://github.com/relgin/cardspotter/isues
